overview: Sonitek Consultancy company is growing fast and we are looking for long term collaboration and team work to create business opportunities and provide excellent customer support service across Canada and beyond. Our company provides training at no cost to you and a very aggressive business plan with no limits. Earnings will depend on your ability and willingness to follow our simple and proven marketing system. We are seeking associates who possess above average communication skills, have high energy, work ethic and have a proven record of success in sales and marketing.
